name: Fayr Leather
description:
The first product is a duffle bag made from vegetable tanned leather.
The next designs (backpack and messenger bag) are already in the pipeline.

Over the last 6 months, a network of tanneries and manufacturers as well as personal connections with industry experts have been formed. This allows Fayr Leather to ensure environmentally friendly production standards and social working conditions,

jobs.title: Co-Founder & Marketing wizard
jobs.description:
You have a passion for fashion and are enthusiastic about marketing?

You want to build an ethical brand from scratch and care about the people who produce our everyday items?

Join me on my journey!
 
Fayr leather produces high-quality leather bags that customers will love. They are ready to be sold, but need somebody who can create a strong brand and take it off the ground. 

I (Rudolf) am looking for a co-founder who can focus on the customer-oriented side of the business, while I take care of production, financials, B2B and everything else. 

Your responsibilities:
	• Social media campaigns
	• SEO/SEM
	• Content creation
	• Branding
	• Copywriting

As the business grows, workload will be either delegated to new employees or outsourced - in any case, you should feel fit to always stay on top and manage others if required. 


Your profile:
	• Self-starter
	• Track record of working independently
	• 2+ years practical experience in social media marketing
	• Experience in branding, seo and content creation
	• Experience in fashion or retail considered a plus
	• High English proficiency (publishable standard) 
	• Passionate about ethical fashion and excited about sustainable leather 

Your commitment could be either part time or full time. Unfortunately, I cannot pay you out of my own pocket. I am happy to offer equity according to your experience and financial reward as soon as we successfully sell. 


Perks:
	• A lot of freedom and autonomy
	• Beautiful leather products at cost price
	• Get creative and design your own products
	• Travel to Bangladesh and take a look behind the scenes
	• Be part of something that has the potential to become big

 
If you are interested, check out my preliminary homepage: www.fayrleather.com and get in touch with me. 
I am looking forward to meet you in person!
